name: Roy Tang
text: Since I was kind of hoping to get some help as to who I can pick for my own hypothetical future cabinet, maybe I should have included the phrase "except for me"  :p

source_obj.text: Since I was kind of hoping to get some help as to who I can pick for my own hypothetical future cabinet, maybe I should have included the phrase "except for me"  :p

replies.text: Bakit naman? Yung iba nga dyan, presidente na, berdugo pa.
